algorithm.name: TIKAIMAGE
algorithm.description: The Apache Tika image detection component.

properties.name: CONFIDENCE_THRESHOLD
properties.description: The minimum confidence score which must be met or exceeded. Detections below this threshold are silently discarded.

properties.name: SAVE_PATH
properties.description: Specifies main directory for storing extracted images.

properties.name: ALLOW_EMPTY_PAGES
properties.description: When true, pages with no images are still stored as tracks with an empty IMAGE_FILES field. When false, empty pages are not stored at all.

properties.name: MPF_FEED_FORWARD_MEDIA_AND_DERIVATIVES
properties.description: Specifies whether or not to pass along original media (PDF, document) as part of a text-extraction pipeline. All derivative images will be marked with the MPF_DERIVATIVE_MEDIA_INSPECTION detection property and will undergo media inspection after this job is complete.

properties.name: ORGANIZE_BY_PAGE
properties.description: Specifies whether or not to store images sorted into subdirectories by page.

actions.name: TIKA IMAGE DETECTION ACTION
actions.description: Executes the Tika image detection algorithm using the default parameters.

actions.name: TIKA IMAGE DETECTION WITH DERIVATIVE MEDIA ACTION
actions.description: Executes the Tika image detection algorithm and enables derivative media processing.

actions.name: JROBBLE: TIKA TEXT DETECTION SOURCE MEDIA ONLY ACTION
actions.description: Executes the Tika text detection algorithm using the default parameters on source media only, no derivatives.

actions.name: JROBBLE: TESSERACT OCR TEXT DETECTION DERIVATIVE MEDIA ONLY ACTION
actions.description: Performs Tesseract OCR on derivative media only.

tasks.name: TIKA IMAGE DETECTION WITH DERIVATIVE MEDIA TASK
actions: TIKA IMAGE DETECTION WITH DERIVATIVE MEDIA ACTION

tasks.name: JROBBLE: TIKA TEXT DETECTION SOURCE MEDIA ONLY TASK
tasks.description: Executes the Tika text detection algorithm using the default parameters on source media only, no derivatives.
actions: JROBBLE: TIKA TEXT DETECTION SOURCE MEDIA ONLY ACTION

tasks.name: JROBBLE: TESSERACT OCR TEXT DETECTION DERIVATIVE MEDIA ONLY TASK
tasks.description: Performs Tesseract OCR on derivative media only.
actions: JROBBLE: TESSERACT OCR TEXT DETECTION DERIVATIVE MEDIA ONLY ACTION

pipelines.name: TIKA IMAGE DETECTION WITH DERIVATIVE MEDIA TESSERACT OCR AND TAGGING PIPELINE
pipelines.description: Performs Tika image detection followed by Tika and Tesseract OCR text detection and keyword tagging of TEXT results.
